DOC.criteria: Eligible receive prostate brachytherapy per Ontario Provincial Guidelines eligible study ( i.e . prostate specific antigen [ PSA ] < 10 , Gleason score < 7 , Stage < = T2a ) Patients already take antiinflammatory drug Patients allergictype reaction , include asthma urticaria , aspirin nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent ( see product information )
